title: Cattle farmers: join our webinar on funding for vet visits
categories: Payments to improve animal health and welfare

content.text: On Tuesday 19 August, we will host a webinar specifically for cattle farmers to explain how they can access funding for an Animal Health and Welfare Review and the follow-up vet visit for endemic diseases.
This session, for both dairy and beef farmers, follows the webinars we held last month for sheep and pig farmers.

Before attending the webinar, we encourage you to take a look at the guidance on GOV.UK (linked above) and a recent post by my colleague Chris which gives a good overview of the steps to apply and the funding available.
The 1-hour session will take place on Tuesday 19 August at 11am.
We hope to see you there. If you can’t make it, don’t worry, we’ll share the webinar recording in this post and on the webinars page after the session ends.
